training_history.model:

  (tcn): TemporalConvNet(
    (network): Sequential(
      (0): TemporalBlock(

          (3): Dropout(p=0.2, inplace=False)

          (7): Dropout(p=0.2, inplace=False)
        )
        (downsample): Conv1d(17, 160, kernel_size=(1,), stride=(1,))
        (relu): ReLU()
      )
      (1): TemporalBlock(

          (1): Chomp1d()
          (2): ReLU()
          (3): Dropout(p=0.2, inplace=False)
          (4): Conv1d(192, 192, kernel_size=(2,), stride=(1,), padding=(2,), dilation=(2,))
          (5): Chomp1d()
          (6): ReLU()
          (7): Dropout(p=0.2, inplace=False)
        )
        (downsample): Conv1d(160, 192, kernel_size=(1,), stride=(1,))

      )
      (2): TemporalBlock(

        (chomp1): Chomp1d()
        (relu1): ReLU()

          (2): ReLU()
          (3): Dropout(p=0.2, inplace=False)
          (4): Conv1d(224, 224, kernel_size=(2,), stride=(1,), padding=(4,), dilation=(4,))

          (7): Dropout(p=0.2, inplace=False)
        )
        (downsample): Conv1d(192, 224, kernel_size=(1,), stride=(1,))
